version_description:
Greetings, Fellow Daoists. Version 1.1 is coming up now!

Here's a list of our newest and latest features

Basic Features:
1. Avatar: Every member can now upload their very own avatar! (Android Only)
2. Bug Fixes: Most of the bugs have been fixed, and more improvements will be implemented to make the site even more user-friendly!

Social:
1. Comments: Comment section is now available! Everyone is now free to leave any comments on any chapter. Say hi to your fellow daoists!
2. Reply: Want to initiate a discussion in the comment section? Feel free to reply to any comment that has caught your eye!
3. Like: Read an enlightening comment or review? Then go and like it!
4. Message: Would like to compare notes with other fellow daoists? Then you can message them privately!

UI & Layout:
1. Brand New Snackbar: We now have a brand new snack bar. Enjoy!
2. Upgraded Explore Page: Easier access to new stories and beginner picks for new readers!
3. Transition Animation Upgraded

Greetings, Fellow Daoists. Version 1.1 is coming up now!

Here's a list of our newest and latest features

Basic Features:
1. Avatar: Every member can now upload their very own avatar! (Android Only)
2. Bug Fixes: Most of the bugs have been fixed, and more improvements will be implemented to make the site even more user-friendly!

Social:
1. Comments: Comment section is now available! Everyone is now free to leave any comments on any chapter. Say hi to your fellow daoists!
2. Reply: Want to initiate a discussion in the comment section? Feel free to reply to any comment that has caught your eye!
3. Like: Read an enlightening comment or review? Then go and like it!
4. Message: Would like to compare notes with other fellow daoists? Then you can message them privately!

UI & Layout:
1. Brand New Snackbar: We now have a brand new snack bar. Enjoy!
2. Upgraded Explore Page: Easier access to new stories and beginner picks for new readers!
3. Transition Animation Upgraded
You are free to get access into the app without an account.

-Watch short video and receive bonus chapters
-Email login and password retrieval

-Watch short video and receive bonus chapters
-Email login and password retrieval

What's new in iOS 1.5:

-Spirit Stones: collect spirit stones and use them to skip ads
-Name change: able to change username on profile page
-Descending chapter order: able to list the chapters in a descending order
-Comments Removal: able to delete your comments on the app

What's new in iOS 1.5:

-Spirit Stones: collect spirit stones and use them to skip ads
-Name change: able to change username on profile page
-Descending chapter order: able to list the chapters in a descending order
-Comments Removal: able to delete your comments on the app

New features:
- What's next? : Voting system for upcoming stories.
- Translator' note: Translator can leave a note at the bottom of each chapter.
- Clear cache: Clear cache button added on “Settings” of profile page.

Optimizations:
- Change of feedback channel to email.
- "Bonus chapter" icon on the content page.
- Battery icon and time display on reading page.

New features:
- Users are able to receive all kinds of Spirit Stones in the Profile tab. Additional feature of earning Spirit Stones through watching video ads.
- Badge system, showcasing your esteemed self.
- Bookshelf has new management features. For a single book, users can download it, delete it, change push notifications for it, cast votes with Power Stones for it, and check the detailed information for it.

Improvements:
- The bookshelf would display the number of unread chapters for each book.
- The notifications and messages in the Inbox tab can be switched through swiping.

What's new in this version:
1. Comments can now be sorted by "Liked", "Newest", and "Oldest"
2. Opening a book for the first time has been optimized for speed.
3. Pull-to-refresh is available now on the Profile page so that information can be synchronized instantly

What's new in this version：
- Originals' Power Ranking added. Come and check the newest popular original stories.
- Number of views added for each book in detail page. Want to know how many people are reading the books you read? Check it now!
- You can change the email setting in profile page.
- Writers and translators can be searched now, so you can search books according to the creators you love.

1. Refreshing Logo & style.
Here we have an overall improvement of page layouts, which will present you with an appealing experience.

2. Gifting function.
In the new update, you will be able to send gifts to support original writers, rewarding them for their engrossing plots and hard work.

1. Refreshing Logo & style.
Here we have an overall improvement of page layouts, which will present you with an appealing experience.

2. Gifting function.
In the new update, you will be able to send gifts to support original writers, rewarding them for their engrossing plots and hard work.

*****What's New*****
- Comics are coming! We added a Webcomic section in this version.
- Writers would be able to write and manage your chapters on App. Dear daoists, it's time to create your very first novel NOW!
- A brand new user library with better user-friendly features, allowing you to find your favorite stories more easily.

*****What's New*****
- Comics are coming! We added a Webcomic section in this version.
- Writers would be able to write and manage your chapters on App. Dear daoists, it's time to create your very first novel NOW!
- A brand new user library with better user-friendly features, allowing you to find your favorite stories more easily.

-More ranking mechanisms have been added to the ranking system which is 24 HRS Best Selling, New Novel.
-A gorgeous layout of Last page in each novel
-A new search engine for comics
-Optimization of reading experience
-Fix the bug of mobile writing

[What's New]
1、Become a Elite Membership! You can join our monthly Elite Membership to enjoy unlimited comics and novels ！
2、A New task System! It will provide a variety of tasks including Daily、Upgrade and Reading. The daily and weekly task will reset daily and weekly which means you can earn SS everyday!
3、Fire a BulleTag for comics！You can comment a instant barrage when reading comics. Meanwhile, you can read other people's comment on the storyboard.

4. New Badge page! Equip the badge you like most!
5. Books in the top 50 will wear this as a badge of honor on its book detail page!
